vote.text: Amendment SA 3788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3788 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Casey. (consideration: CR S2063; text: CR S2063) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3788 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Casey.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
